publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3707 Ross Finnie: Water Environment and Water Services (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees that the Water Environment and Water Services (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Allan Wilson*, Mr Andy Kerr*, Iain Gray*
